column1:
Person A: I need to place to eat, say, in the center of the town with some creative food.
Person B: I don't have any creative restaurants in that area. maybe another cuisine?
Person A: What about Italian food?
Person B: We have many Italian restaurants! If price is no issue, I recommend Caffe Uno.
Person A: That is great. I need to make a booking for one.
Person B: I can do that. What day and time would you like the booking?
Person A: book a table for 1 people at 11:15 on tuesday with reference number please and thank you
Person B: Your reservation is booked. Your reference number is 4UROSY5A .
Person A: Thanks for handling the restaurant booking. I also need a cheap place to stay near the restaurant.
Person B: If a guesthouse is okay, Alexander Bed and Breakfast is a 4-star cheap hotel in the center part of town near the restaurant. Will that work?
Person A: That sounds great! Can I get the phone number and postcode too?
Person B: The phone number is 01223525725 and the postcode is cb12de
Person A: Great, Thank you so much for all your help.
Person B: You are most welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
Person A: No, that's everything I needed. Thanks again! Goodbye!
Person B: Have a wonderful trip.

Person A: I am looking for places to go in a boat in the Cambridge area. Can you help me?
Person B: Sure, we have 4 different boat attractions here in Cambridge. What part of town will you be in?
Person A: Any part of town would be fine, can I just get the postcode of one?
Person B: Absolutely. The postcode for Camboats is cb58sx, located East of Cambridge.
Person A: I'm also looking for a train leaving from Cambridge and arriving by 15:15.
Person B: Where are you traveling to please?
Person A: I would like to go to peterborough.
Person B: Awesome. And for what day will that be for?
Person A: Traveling to peterborough will be on Monday.
Person B: TR2586 arrives by 14:56. Would you like to book it?
Person A: Can you tell me the departure time as well as the travel time of the train?
Person B: The train leaves at 14:06 and will arrive at the destination in 50 minutes
Person A: Great. Thank you very much. That is all I need for now.
Person B: We are happy to help. Thank you for using our service. Have a great day!

Person A: I'm looking for a place called kambar, can you help me?
Person B: Sure! It is a nightclub located in the centre of Cambridge. The address is 1 Wheeler Street and admission is 5 pounds. Do you need more information?
Person A: Can I get the postcode and phone number for them please?
Person B: Certainly! Their phone number is 01223842725 and postcode is cb23qb. Can I help with anything else?
Person A: Thanks. I am also looking for a restaurant that serves lebanese food in the centre. Do you have any suggestions?
Person B: The ali baba is a very nice one. Should I book it for you ?
Person A: Yes can you please book that?
Person B: How many people and for what day?
Person A: Is the Ali Baba cheap?
Person B: It is in the moderate price range. Would you like a booking?
Person A: Well, then I really want to stay with something cheap. How about indian food?
Person B: I recommend kohinoor, they are indian with a cheap price, would you like more info or a booking?
Person A: Yes. I need their address and phone number as well.
Person B: the address is 74 Mill Road City Centre, and the phone number is 01223323639. Can I get you anything else?
Person A: Can you tell me which bus i can take to the restaurant?
Person B: Sure. What day would you like to go?
Person A: The same day.
Person B: I'm sorry but I need the travel day to look that up for you?
Person A: I do not need a bus, have a nice day thanks for the restaurant information.
Person B: No problem is there anything else I can help you with today?
Person A: No thank you that will be all
Person B: thank you for using this service good bye

Person A: I'm just looking for a place to sleep tonight in Cambridge.
Person B: Sure, there are 33 hotels available. Do you have any other criteria?
Person A: Could it be in the north and include free wifi please?
Person B: There are several places to stay in the north that offer free internet. do you have a preference of stars and price range?
Person A: No. But it should be a guesthouse.
Person B: There are several in the moderate price range and 1 in the cheap range, do you have a preference?
Person A: I would like a guesthouse in the moderate price range for one person and four nights, starting on Sunday.
Person B: There are several options, but I would definitely recommend the limehouse. If that sounds good, I can book it for you.
Person A: Yes please. I need it for 1 person for 4 nights starting on Sunday.
Person B: I have made those reservations and your reference number is FLU3B3SI .
Person A: i also need a place to dine in the north
Person B: I found 9 restaurants in the North. What type of food would you like?
Person A: Thank you, I'm looking for a place that serves Chinese food.
Person B: What's your budget?
Person A: The price doesn't matter.
Person B: Would you like to try the Hotpot?
Person A: Sure! I need a table for 1 at 16:15 on Sunday.
Person B: Ok I will book it for you and get a reference number

Person A: I am traveling to Cambridge soon. I can't wait to try some local restaurants. Can you help me with a place to stay?
Person B: There are many hotels in Cambridge. Is there a particular area you would like to stay in?
Person A: I need it to have 4 stars and parking too.
Person B: I have 19 hotels that meet that criteria. Do you have a price range in mind?
Person A: I don't have a price range, just whatever will get me a good hotel in the east area.
Person B: I would like to recommend allenbell if that is alright with you?
Person A: Do they have free internet and can you provide the postcode?
Person B: Yes the has Wifi and the postcode is cb11ee
Person A: Are there any inexpensive Indian Restaurants near Allenbell?
Person B: There are two here. I recommend pipasha restaurant. Do you want a reservation?
Person A: Is it a cheap restaurant?
Person B: No it is not. There aren't any cheap Indian restaurants in the east. Would you like to try a different part of town?
Person A: Yeah area doesn't matter. Just choose one cheap indian restaurant in Cambridge please then provide me with the area, address, and postcode for it.
Person B: The Mahal of Cambridge, the address is 3-5 Millers Yard Mill Lane and the postcode is cb21rq.
Person A: Please tell me the area too
Person B: It is located in the centre area. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
Person A: That'll be it for today. Thank you very much.
Person B: Thanks for calling. Have a wonderful day.

Person A: I'm looking for a place to stay that is moderately priced and includes free parking.
Person B: Do you want to stay in a specific area of town? And would you be fine staying at a guesthouse?
Person A: I would like to stay in the centre of town. A guest house is fine.
Person B: It looks like we don't have anything moderately priced in the center of town. Would you like to try a different area?
Person A: Yes, how about the north?
Person B: we have quite a few when are you planning your stay?
Person A: Great. can you recommend one and book it for 3 nights coming in on friday. There will be 2 in my party
Person B: I was able to book the acorn guesthouse for 3 nights for 2. Reference number is EAFYZ0VC . The address is 154 chesterton road, phone 01223353888. Will you need anything else today?
Person A: Yes. I want to go from Cambridge to Peterborough by train.
Person B: There are 266 trains matching your query. What day will you be traveling?
Person A: I will travel Saturday after 17:45
Person B: Okay, I see 12 options here. Would you like me to reserve tickets for you?
Person A: Yes, please book the tickets and I need the reference number.
Person B: How many tickets will you need on this trip?
Person A: I will need 2 tickets please.
Person B: Okay, I reserved your tickets. The ref. is R9SEDNSD
Person A: Can I get the train ID and departure time for the one you chose?
Person B: The train id is TR7918 and it departs at 18:06. Is there anything else I can help with today?
Person A: No thanks, that is all.
Person B: Your welcome. Have a lovely trip and day!

Person A: I am looking for attractions in the centre.
Person B: The city centre has many attractions to offer. Do you have a specific type of attraction you are interested in?
Person A: I would like the attraction in the centre, and I would like the amount of the entrance fees in the centre.
Person B: There are many museums with free entrance, or nightclubs with fees around 4-5 pounds. Would you be interested in more information on any of these?
Person A: Actually, can you find a train to birmingham new street for me? I need to leave after 19:45.
Person B: What is your departure site and day of travel?
Person A: Should depart from Cambridge and go to Birmingham New Street
Person B: There are 28 trains that fit that criteria, what time would you like to arrive?
Person A: It doesn't matter, the first train after 19:45 works for me. I need to book it for four people, and please provide the reference number.
Person B: I was able to book 4 tickets on train TR7769 departing at 20:01 and arriving at 23:44. Your reference number is H6UCCIBA . Is there anything else?
Person A: No, that will do it! Thank you for all your help!
Person B: You're welcome. Have a great day.

Person A: I am looking for a particular restaurant. Its name is called cafe uno.
Person B: Caffe Uno? Excellent choice! Would you like to make a reservation?
Person A: Yes please! There will be 7 of us dining on sunday
Person B: At what time would you like the reservation?
Person A: 16:15 seems like a good time.
Person B: I have booked the table for Sunday, the reference number is 1XGV4VGP . Is there anything else I can help you with today?
Person A: That's all I needed help with. Thanks a lot!
Person B: Awesome, thank you for using Cambridge TownInfo centre. Enjoy the restaurant!

Person A: I'm looking for a train leaving on tuesday please.
Person B: I have a train going to London King's Cross that will leave at 05:00.
Person A: Actually I need to go to London Liverpool Street from Cabridge.
Person B: Alright, what time would you like to leave?
Person A: I would like to leave anytime after 20:15.
Person B: Ok, I have TR9616 that leaves at 21:39. Will that work for you?
Person A: Is that on Tuesday? If so that would work. I'll need the train ID and price.
Person B: The train ID is TR9616.
Person A: I also need the price.
Person B: The price is 16.60 pounds. Do you need any further assistance?
Person A: No, that's all. Thank you.
Person B: Thank you for allowing me to help you. Have a great day.

Person A: Please, I need to find a hospital in town, will you please help me?
Person B: Addenbrookes Hospital is a great choice, their address is Hills Rd, Cambridge
Person A: What is the phone number?
Person B: The phone number to Addenbrookes Hospital is 01223245151. Is there anything else I may assist you with today?
Person A: What is their address?
Person B: Their address is Hills Rd, Cambridge Postcode : CB20QQ. Is there anything else I can do for you?
Person A: No that it is it. Thank you.
Person B: You're welcome. Thank you for using the Cambridge TownInfo centre.
